name: Save Or Kill
description:
Save Or Kill is a puzzle game in which the player must kill the black ball and save the white ball in order to complete the levels. By rotating the level, the player can change the balls' direction, but be carefull! Both balls will move at the same time!

This videogame was made for the "Global Game Jam". Actually winner of 2 prizes at VII EVAD Game Jam: Best videogame and best design

Created by:

- Fran Osuna Comino

- Manuel Herrera Martínez

Actually in development for Android.
